about.title: About UpRoof
about.description: UpRoof provides professional roofing solutions: construction, painting, and maintenance. Our team works precisely and reliably, adhering to high quality standards.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We use proven materials and technologies for long-lasting results.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We meet deadlines, provide clear communication and guarantees.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: We work safely and responsibly both on projects and in material selection.

metalRoof.title: Standing Seam Metal Roof ‚Äì Private House
metalRoof.description: Full-cycle roof construction with metal profile covering: structure, insulation, and covering installation.

roofPainting.title: Roof Painting ‚Äì Apartment Building
roofPainting.description: Mechanical roof cleaning, primer application, and double coating for long-term durability.

roofMaintenance.title: Roof Maintenance and Gutter Cleaning
roofMaintenance.description: Snow removal, damage inspection, and drainage system cleaning for safe operation.

construction.title: ROOF CONSTRUCTION
construction.description: We offer full-cycle roof construction and renovation from A to Z. Roof structure restoration, insulation material installation, roof covering installation, and roof accessories mounting.

painting.title: ROOF PAINTING
painting.description: We pay great attention to painting and roof preparation to ensure flawless paint durability and visual appearance in the long term!

maintenance.title: ROOF MAINTENANCE
maintenance.description: Professional roof maintenance - snow removal from roofs, leaf cleaning from gutters, roof repairs, and damage detection.

q1.question: What services do we offer?
q1.answer: We specialize in high-quality roof construction, starting with the construction and renovation of roof structures, to the installation of roofing with all the necessary roof accessories and additional parts. For your convenience, we offer all the necessary roof solutions, including chimney renovation, skylight installation, gutter installation, construction of safety elements and others. We offer a 10-year warranty for the installation of our rolled profile roofs!

q2.question: Do we provide a warranty?
q2.answer: We provide a guarantee for all our work, for example, we offer a 10-year guarantee for rolled profile assembly work and an additional 50-year manufacturer's guarantee for the materials used.

q3.question: How quickly can roof diagnostics be performed?
q3.answer: We use advanced diagnostic equipment to assess roof conditions efficiently. For most projects, we can complete a thorough inspection and provide a detailed assessment within 1-2 business days after initial contact.

q4.question: What types of roofs do we work with?
q4.answer: We work with pitched roof construction and renovation and the most common materials we use are rolled metal roofs, metal sheet roofs and tiled roofs, but we can also install your special material. Our team consists of several teams, each of which specializes in a specific type of roof and regularly updates its knowledge to provide the best solutions for each type of roof.

q5.question: Can roof repairs be carried out in winter?
q5.answer: Yes, we can perform most roof repairs year-round. While some materials work best in warmer weather, we have specialized techniques and materials that allow us to safely complete emergency repairs even in cold conditions.

review1.name: Dita Major
review1.text: Very good service! We needed to remove the chimney, seal the chimney hole in the roof and wall, as well as remove the fasteners where the chimney was attached to the outer wall, and seal the holes there as well. They also inspected the roof and sealed the cracks where water was leaking through. They then removed all the materials and left a completely clean, beautiful place, and they also neatly put the removed chimney pipe back where it needed to be. Fantastic attitude towards us as a customer, very pleasant cooperation. We will definitely turn to them again when the need arises!

review2.name: XBRAND STUDIO
review2.text: I highly recommend this team! The work was done perfectly ‚Äì the roof was painted qualitatively, carefully and quickly. The team was professional, responsive and took care of everything down to the smallest detail. The result looks great, and I am more than satisfied with the work done. Thank you for the great work!

review3.name: Alexey Konstantinov
review3.text: I am satisfied with the work, UpRoof is a responsible firm, I recommend UpRoof company to everyone who needs a quality roofüëçüëçüëç

cookies.title: We Value Your Privacy
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can choose which cookies to accept.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At UpRoof (SIA UpLift), we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services.

dataCollected.title: Information We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following types of information:

items.contact: Contact information (name, email, phone number) when you submit inquiries
items.technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
items.usage: Usage data (pages visited, time spent, referring pages)

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.intro: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website:

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the website to function properly. These include session management and security features.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use our website through Vercel Analytics. This includes page views, navigation patterns, and performance metrics. No personally identifiable information is collected.

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.access: Right to access your personal data
items.erasure: Right to request deletion of your data
items.restriction: Right to restrict processing of your data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
